personal_score.description: Per-model personal score. Null when this cohort is cold (no observations yet).

sample_count.description: Number of quality observations for this model

last_updated.description: Timestamp of most recent observation for this model

task_type.description: Task categories for reputation scoring. Protocol types are literals; community types use namespace:type format.

anyOf.description: Community-defined task type in namespace:type format (e.g., legal-guild:contract_review).

confidence_threshold.description: Sample count at which task-specific scores are trusted at full weight. Protocol-recommended default: 30. Downstream consumers implement blending: effective_score = α * task_score + (1-α) * aggregate_score, where α = min(1.0, sample_count / confidence_threshold).
